description: There's no particular reason why the EC2 and OpenStack API's need to live on the same port. We should run them on separate ports, so that we don't need the subdomains to be set to anything specific, and perhaps /optionally/ let them live on the same port.
title: EC2 API and OpenStack API should live on separate ports
